pkmkdoc.description:
GrayScale is a free and Open Source Black and White edit plugin for Aperture. Along with Black and White conversion it will add simulated film grain and sepia tone. It is licensed under the MIT Open Source License.
It includes a Core Image filter to handle the conversion to Black and White in Apple's Core Image framework.
